creator: paul.smith@lawlex.com.au
text:
The attachment contains some patches and some new files. 

The patch modifies PatternParser to allow a PatternLayout to use %P to output 
all the Property KVP for the event, or %P{key} to output a single value for 
that key (exactly the same as MDC now does).

Patch also modifies XMLLayout to output the contents of the propertySet, and 
the log4j.dtd has been modified to specific the allowable log4j:propertySet as 
an element of the event, containing log4j:data (thanks to Scott Deboy for some 
code which he gave me, I tweaked only minorly).

Note: The property keys are sorted as MDC is done, and I know this is not 
ideal, but when the group can decide the best way to co-ordinate this for 
testing runs only, I can patch both MDC & Property set stuff. 

Patch also patches some test cases, which uses the additional files as 
witnesses. 

Hope I haven't stuffed anything up.

cheers,

Paul Smith

creator: paul.smith@lawlex.com.au
text:
Created attachment 5760
Patches and new files for propertySet support

Paul, you're a committer now, so you have the ability to commit your own 
patch ;)  Because it's been a year and a half since this issue was opened, I'm 
assuming you've lost interest, so I'm closing this item.  If you're still 
interested, by all means feel free to commit these changes or even simply 
reopen this Bugzilla issue, changing its version to 1.3 so we know it's current 
and relevant.
creator: yoavs@computer.org
